item.description:
Oops!
I WILL be here for tomorrow April 2nd 5:45-6:30
Laughter Club at Jai Yoga in Brunswick!

I would love to encourage EVERYONE to attend!! If you are coming up from Portland, there is a GREAT restaurant you can go to afterwards called Frontier (sanwiches and paninis)

Come Laugh, relieve stress and get your weekend going on the right foot-no matter what your mood is!

Please join us!
Call Katie 207 239 8667. If you have further questions.

Otherwise see you at Jai Yoga in Fort Andross 14 Maine St Brunswick.

And if you want to become a Laughter Yoga Leader...join Katie on May 15 & 16 in Bath for a 2 day training!

be well andhahahaha
Katie
item.how_to_find_us: Jai Yoga is located on the third floor of Fort Andross
item.name: Maine Laughter Yoga Club w/ The Levity Coach April Meetup
